divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 16, 2012, I witnessed a black triangle craft pass over head. I noticed the object when I was walking back from my car. I thought it might be a plane until I realized it made no sound and didn't seem to have a viewable form. The craft few overhead like a plane would. You could not see the actual outline of the craft since it blended into the night sky until I looked really close and could see a V. I only noticed the craft due to the main light coming from the front of the craft. There seemed to be no other lights coming from the craft. I was a little freaked out since it made no sound. I just kept looking as it passed over head. The craft disappeared from view after about one minute.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Sewickley
There were no other sightings in Sewickley on or around May 16th 2012
